name: The Whisperer
personality: Soft-spoken, distant, always listening to the pipes. Speaks like they’re repeating someone else’s words.
description: A figure who lives in the tunnels beneath the Strip. They press their ear to pipes and vents, claiming the metal carries voices from above… and below.

idle: Shh… the pipes are speaking again.
Voices travel farther in the dark.
player_present: You carry a voice with you. It’s faint, but familiar.
triangle_active: The tunnels are vibrating. Something’s waking up.
Three points… one hum… it’s all connected down here.
vent_event: Someone whispered your name through the vents.
The metal remembers things we forget.

notes: The Whisperer hears voices through pipes and vents. Strongly tied to Jax/Overseer echo bleed and triangle hum events. Rarely seen, often heard.
